DataElement.preferredName: Derived Current Karnofsky Performance Status Date Day Calculation Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numeric value to represent the current KPS as a calculated number of days.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time._A standard way of measuring the ability of cancer patients to perform ordinary tasks. The Karnofsky Performance scores range from 0 to 100. A higher score means the patient is better able to carry out daily activities. KPS may be used to determine a patient's prognosis, to measure changes in a patient's ability to function, or to decide if a patient could be included in a clinical trial._The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:A standard way of measuring the ability of cancer patients to perform ordinary tasks. The Karnofsky Performance scores range from 0 to 100. A higher score means the patient is better able to carry out daily activities. KPS may be used to determine a patient's prognosis, to measure changes in a patient's ability to function, or to decide if a patient could be included in a clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
An index designed for classifying patients 16 years of age or older by their functional impairment.

Property.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event will happen or has happened.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 2021-7-21 ak Created for CCG HOPE-CARE derived CDE.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours._The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Calculation created for TCGA content requested by Dr. Ari Kahn.  This VD uses a calculation of dividing a value by the number of milliseconds in a day (86,400,000) to result in a number of days, stored as a whole number.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: CCG PTCL (Center for Cancer Genomics - Peripheral T Cell Lymphoma)
